slides.title: Introduction
slides.content: Overview of requirements: Greeting, NLP, Table Allocation, Navigation.

slides.title: Greeting
slides.content: Rule-based greeting based on system time (Good morning / afternoon / evening).

slides.title: NLP
slides.content: Speech-to-text + NLU to extract party size. Supports 'two friends and me', 'a table for six'.

slides.title: Table Allocation
slides.content: SQL DB storing table metadata. Single fit then combinable tables with sync groups.

slides.title: Navigation
slides.content: ROS-style stack: A* for global plan and reactive local obstacle avoidance using LIDAR/cameras.
